ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Consensus open data governance aligning privacy, utility, and interoperability.

bullets.item: PII protection through de-identification and access tiers.
Standardized APIs and open licensing for reuse.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Tiered access with clear PII handling and audit trails.
Interoperable APIs with versioning and SLA.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: License policy enabling civic innovation while ensuring attribution.
